nithignya sangamaye sabhapathi janadipathi nithignya wijayadasa rajapaksha mahatha wisin mathisabaya swamin wahanselata nithiyen thahanam kala yuthu bawata parlimenthuwata yojanawak idiripath kara atha.mage adahasa anuwa eya ithamath kalochitha yojanawakya.swamin wahansela yanu laukika jiwitha samanga bandim thabagatha yuthu kottasayak nowe.un wahanselage wagakima dharmaya pracharaya karamin un wahanselada sasarin ethera wimaya.dharmaya kerehi wuwada bandim thabagatha yuthu nowa bawa budun wahanse deshana kara atha.un wahanse dharmaya upama karanne pahurakataya.ethera wu pasu pahura kara thabagena yame awashyathawak nomatha.rajya palanaya sambandhayen da swamin wahanselata aththe ee pilibanda dharmanukula wiwaranayak sapayima misa siwura ussagena kagasamin bauddhayan wana apa hata anya aagamikayanta muhuna dimata bari thathwayak udakaralima nowe.
